name: Takuya Kanbara
effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost. [Main][Once Per Turn] You may place 5 cards with [Hybrid] in their traits from your trash under this Tamer in any order to digivolve it into an [EmperorGreymon] in your hand for its digivolution cost as if this Tamer is a level 5 red Digimon.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] This Digimon gets +2000 DP. While this Digimon has 10000 DP or more, it gains ＜Security Attack +1＞. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
